long_description: Let's be honest, you hate winter camping and you've certainly never been to Everest Base Camp. But that doesn't mean you won't benefit from the performance of the waterproof Forsake Pilot boots. Waterproof, breathable membranes in the full-grain leather/nubuck/Cordura(R) nylon uppers keep you dry and comfortable in adverse weather. Composite shanks, rugged outsoles and dual-density EVA midsoles provide traction and stability on sketchy surfaces. Forsake Pilot boots have gusseted tongues to keep moisture from seeping in.
short_description: Let's be honest, you hate winter camping and you've certainly never been to Everest Base Camp. But that doesn't mean you won't benefit from the performance of the waterproof Forsake Pilot boots.
